result.instructions: Call kirby_init once per session before calling any other Kirby tools. Use kirby_tool_suggest if unsure which tool/resource to use.

contents.text:
[
    {
        "kind": "resource_template",
        "name": "kirby:\/\/blueprint\/{encodedId}",
        "title": "kirby:\/\/blueprint\/{encodedId}",
        "whenToUse": "Use to read a single Kirby blueprint (schema) by id via the resource template kirby:\/\/blueprint\/{encodedId}.",
        "keywords": {
            "blueprint": 100,
            "schema": 60,
            "fields": 50,
            "tabs": 40,
            "sections": 40,
            "validation": 30,
            "runtime": 20
        }
    },
    {
        "kind": "resource_template",
        "name": "kirby:\/\/cli\/command\/{command}",
        "title": "kirby:\/\/cli\/command\/{command}",
        "whenToUse": "Use to read the parsed `kirby <command> --help` output for one Kirby CLI command (args\/options).",
        "keywords": {
            "cli": 100,
            "command": 100,
            "help": 80,
            "args": 40,
            "options": 40,
            "usage": 40
        }
    },
    {
        "kind": "resource",
        "name": "kirby:\/\/commands",
        "title": "kirby:\/\/commands",

            "cli": 100,

            "help": 40,
            "kirby": 30

    },
    {
